content.text: 从数组中返回一个随机元素。Returns a random element from an array
数组中的随机元素，如果数组为空则返回undefined。Random element from the array, or undefined if array is empty
当arr不是数组时抛出错误。When arr is not an array

```ts
// Basic usage
sample([3, 7, 9, 11]); // -> 9 (randomly selected)
sample(['apple', 'banana', 'cherry']); // -> 'banana' (randomly selected)
```

```ts
// Edge cases
sample([]); // -> undefined
sample([42]); // -> 42 (only one element)
```

summary.text: 要从中采样的数组。Array to sample from

text.comment: 要从中采样的数组。Array to sample from

Function:

sample

Description:

从数组中返回一个随机元素。Returns a random element from an array

Returns:

数组中的随机元素，如果数组为空则返回undefined。Random element from the array, or undefined if array is empty

Throws:

当arr不是数组时抛出错误。When arr is not an array

Example:
// Basic usage
sample([3, 7, 9, 11]); // -> 9 (randomly selected)
sample(['apple', 'banana', 'cherry']); // -> 'banana' (randomly selected)
Example:
// Edge cases
sample([]); // -> undefined
sample([42]); // -> 42 (only one element)
Example:
// Object arrays
const users = [{ name: 'John' }, { name: 'Jane' }, { name: 'Bob' }];
sample(users); // -> { name: 'Jane' } (randomly selected)
